install.name: K2 Extended Image
install.author: Hari Karam Singh
install.description: Allow more flexible handling of item image's such as fit height/width, cropping and individual size previewing and overrides. K2 "width" values are used as the largest dimension constraint (width for landscape, height for portrait) with the smaller constraint being calculated from this value and the chosen aspect ratio.

param.name: xs_aspect_ratio
param.label: Aspect Ratio
param.description:
Fit Box
Resizes while maintaining the original image's aspect ratio to ensure BOTH dimensions fit in the box defined by the K2 value scaled to the aspect ratio specified here.

Crop
Resizes the image by one dimension and crops the other to end up with an image the exact size defined by the K2 value and the aspect ratio specified here.

param.name: xs_quality
param.label: JPEG Quality (%)
param.description: Blank or 0 to use Desired Filesize or K2 global setting.

param.name: xs_filesize
param.label: Or Desired Filesize (kB)
param.description: Estimated size in kB's for the resultant JPEG. Set the quality value above to 0 or blank to use this method. Set both values to blank to use the K2 global quality setting.
